english: Now there came a strange interruption .
chinese: 这时候又出现了一个奇怪的插曲。

english: Dudley provided the only musical interludes .
chinese: 达德利演奏了仅有的音乐插曲。

english: There's an interesting sidelight to this story .
chinese: 在这件事上面还有一个有趣的插曲。
爱情的插曲一幕刚完又接一幕。

english: For in men, as a rule, love is but an episode .
chinese: 一般说来，爱情在男人身上只不过是一个插曲。
插曲造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: This episode was characteristic of his perpetual suspiciousness .
chinese: 这一插曲说明他经常犯疑心病。

english: The novel deals with the romantic episodes of her early life .
chinese: 小说叙述了她早期生活的浪漫插曲。

english: There was, they felt, one very humorous incident on the way .
chinese: 出了一个他们认为十分有趣的小插曲。

english: This episode marked the end of the japanese offensive surge .
chinese: 这个插曲标志着日本攻势高潮的终结。

english: Her time in paris was a happy interlude in a difficult career .
chinese: 她在巴黎期间是她艰辛的事业中一段愉快的插曲。

english: It had been the smallest event of all that had unsettled him the most .
chinese: 使他感到最不安的事情是一件最微不足道的插曲。

english: Clearly that was a moment, an interlude, belonging solely to the past .
chinese: 显然，那只是个插曲，一个仅仅属于往事的时刻。

english: It was a very interesting episode at a time when we were dying .
chinese: 这是正当我们快要倒闭的时候出现的一段很有意思的插曲。

english: If she wants something to write about she has only to describe that episode .
chinese: 如果他需要写什么，只要写这个插曲就够了。

english: I now have to record a small but at the time vexatious military episode .
chinese: 现在我不得不记述一段军事上的插曲，事情虽小，但在当时却令人恼恨。
